sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_d384d1b607010110850af61d7c1ed0cf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.MSOfficeUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>/**
 * Helper script include containing methods for various activities such as:
 * Getting auth token
 * Uploading file to user's onedrive
 * Downloading file from user's onedrive 
 * @author  Rahul Pandey, rahul.pandey@hotmail.co.in
 * @version 1.0, Feb 2022

 */</description><name>MSOfficeUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var MSOfficeUtils = Class.create();
MSOfficeUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    /**
     * This function makes required information available to client side script, which later can be utilized to do code flow authorization from Azure.
     * @ tenantid = tenant represents an organization in Azure Active Directory.
     * @ clientid = The client id of the application created in Azure. Reference https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/develop/howto-create-service-principal-portal
     * @ redirectUrl = The UI page in the instance where azure redirects once authorization is success
     */

    getAuthDetails: function() {
        var tenantid = (JSUtil.notNil(gs.getProperty('msOffice.tenant'))) ? gs.getProperty('msOffice.tenant') : "common";
        var clientid = gs.getProperty("msOffice.client_id");
        var redirectUrl = encodeURIComponent("https://" + gs.getProperty("instance_name") + ".service-now.com/" + gs.getProperty("msOffice.redirectPage"));
        var authDetailsObject = {};
        authDetailsObject.tenantid = tenantid;
        authDetailsObject.clientid = clientid;
        authDetailsObject.redirectUrl = redirectUrl;
        return JSON.stringify(authDetailsObject);
    },
    /**
     * This function generate token utilizing below details.
     * @ code = code recieved from code auth flow
     * @ tenantid = tenant represents an organization in Azure Active Directory.
     * @ clientid = The client id of the application created in Azure. Reference https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/develop/howto-create-service-principal-portal
     * @ redirectUrl = The UI page in the instance where azure redirects once authorization is success
     * @ clientsecret = The client secret of the application created in Azure. Reference https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/develop/howto-create-service-principal-portal    
     */
    getToken: function() {
        var tansactionObject = {};
        try {
            var code = this.getParameter("sysparm_mscode");
            var fileid = this.getParameter("sysparm_fileid");
            var tenantid = (JSUtil.notNil(gs.getProperty('msOffice.tenant'))) ? gs.getProperty('msOffice.tenant') : "common";
            var clientid = gs.getProperty("msOffice.client_id");
            var clientsecret = gs.getProperty("msOffice.client_secret");
            var redirectUrl = encodeURIComponent("https://" + gs.getProperty("instance_name") + ".service-now.com/" + gs.getProperty("msOffice.redirectPage"));
            var getAuth = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
            getAuth.setEndpoint('https://login.microsoftonline.com/' + tenantid + '/oauth2/v2.0/token');
            var authBody = 'client_id=' + clientid + '&scope=Files.ReadWrite.All&redirect_uri=' + redirectUrl + '&code=' + code + '&grant_type=authorization_code&client_secret=' + clientsecret;
            getAuth.setRequestBody(authBody);
            getAuth.setHttpMethod('post');
            getAuth.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
            var Authresponse = getAuth.execute();
            var responseBody = Authresponse.getBody();
            this._logger(responseBody);
            var parsedResponse = JSON.parse(responseBody);
            if (JSUtil.notNil(parsedResponse.access_token)) {
                if (JSUtil.notNil(gs.getProperty('msOffice.resumableUpload')) && gs.getProperty('msOffice.resumableUpload') == "true")
                    return this.uploadLargeFile(parsedResponse.access_token, fileid); // currently not supported.
                else
                    return this.uploadFile(parsedResponse.access_token, fileid);
            } else {
                tansactionObject.error = true;
                tansactionObject.message = responseBody;
                return JSON.stringify(tansactionObject);
            }
        } catch (ex) {
            tansactionObject.error = true;
            tansactionObject.message = ex.message;
        }
    },

    /**
     * This function uploads servicenow attachment to user's onedrive
     * @ token = MS auth token
     * @ fileid = attachement sys_id
     * @ folderName = the name of the instance
     */

    uploadFile: function(token, fileid) {
        var editorDetails = {};
        try {
            var folderName = gs.getProperty('instance_name');
            var fileDetails = this.getFileDetails(fileid);
            var uploadToDrive = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
            uploadToDrive.setEndpoint('https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/drive/root:/' + folderName + "/" + fileDetails.fileName + ':/content');
            uploadToDrive.setHttpMethod('put');
            uploadToDrive.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
            uploadToDrive.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", fileDetails.contentType);
            uploadToDrive.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "Bearer " + token);
            uploadToDrive.setRequestBodyFromAttachment(fileid);
            var driveResponse = uploadToDrive.execute();
            var parsedUpload = JSON.parse(driveResponse.getBody());
            this._logger("uploadFile Full JSON " + JSON.stringify(parsedUpload));
            this._logger("uploadFile id " + parsedUpload.id);
            this._logger("uploadFile parentReference " + parsedUpload.parentReference.driveId);
            editorDetails.attachmentid = fileid;
            editorDetails.attachmenttable = fileDetails.tablename;
            editorDetails.url = parsedUpload.webUrl.toString(); //'https://onedrive.live.com/edit.aspx?cid=' + parsedUpload.parentReference.driveId + 'view&resid=' + parsedUpload.id;
            editorDetails.token = token;
            editorDetails.recordid = fileDetails.recordid;
            editorDetails.fileName = fileDetails.fileName;
            editorDetails.driveFileId = parsedUpload.id;
            editorDetails.deletePrevious = (gs.getProperty('msOffice.deleteprevious') && gs.getProperty('msOffice.deleteprevious') == "true") ? true : false;
            editorDetails.iconpath = fileDetails.iconpath;
            editorDetails.title = gs.getMessage('Attached by') + "" + fileDetails.createdBy + gs.getMessage('on') + " " + fileDetails.createdOn;
            return JSON.stringify(editorDetails);
        } catch (ex) {
            editorDetails.error = true;
            editorDetails.message = ex.message;
        }
    },
    /**
    Resumable upload code start
    Currently resumable upload is not supported so, docuement editor feature is limited to 4MB files only
    */
    uploadLargeFile: function(token, fileid) {
        var fileDetails = this.getFileDetails(fileid);
        this.createUploadSession(token, fileDetails);
    },

    createUploadSession: function(token, fileDetails) {
        var createSession = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        createSession.setEndpoint('https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/drive/root:/' + fileDetails.fileName + ':/createUploadSession');
        createSession.setHttpMethod('post');
        createSession.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
        createSession.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
        createSession.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "Bearer " + token);
        var sessionObject = {};
        var itemObject = {};
        itemObject["@microsoft.graph.conflictBehavior"] = "rename";
        //sessionObject.item = JSON.stringify(itemObject);
        sessionObject.deferCommit = false;
        sessionObject.name = fileDetails.fileName.toString();
        createSession.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(sessionObject));
        var sessionResponse = createSession.execute();
        this._logger("sessionResponse Body " + sessionResponse.getBody());

    },

    /*
Resumable upload code end
Currently resumable upload is not supported so, docuement editor feature is limited to 4MB files only
*/

    /**
     * This function downloads edited file from onedrive to servicenow as attachment
     * @ token = MS auth token
     * @ table = table name where new attachment should be attached, this information is being reused from attachment which is being edited.
     * @ recordid = sys_id of the record where new attachment will be attached, this information is being reused from attachment which is being edited.
     * @ filename = Name of new file, this information is being reused from attachment which is being edited.
     * @ attachmentid = sys_id of the original attachment which is being edited
     * @ driveFileId = the item id of file stored on onedrive
     */
    downloadFileProcessor: function(token, table, recordid, filename, attachmentid, driveFileId) {
        var downloadFromDrive = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        downloadFromDrive.setEndpoint('https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0//me/drive/items/' + driveFileId + '/content');
        downloadFromDrive.setHttpMethod('get');
        downloadFromDrive.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
        downloadFromDrive.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "Bearer " + token);
        downloadFromDrive.saveResponseBodyAsAttachment(table, recordid, filename);
        var downloadFromDriveResponse = downloadFromDrive.execute();
        var newFile = downloadFromDriveResponse.getResponseAttachmentSysid();
        this._logger("Downloaded File" + newFile);
        if ((gs.getProperty('msOffice.deleteprevious') && gs.getProperty('msOffice.deleteprevious') == "true"))
            this.deletePreviousVersion(attachmentid);
        return newFile;
    },

    /**
     * This function is client script facing method to  collect information and return the sys_id of downloaded new attachment sys_id
     * @ token = MS auth token
     * @ table = table name where new attachment should be attached, this information is being reused from attachment which is being edited.
     * @ recordid = sys_id of the record where new attachment will be attached, this information is being reused from attachment which is being edited.
     * @ filename = Name of new file, this information is being reused from attachment which is being edited.
     * @ attachmentid = sys_id of the original attachment which is being edited
     * @ driveFileId = the item id of file stored on onedrive
     */
    downloadFile: function() {
        var token = this.getParameter("sysparm_token");
        var table = this.getParameter("sysparm_tablename");
        var recordid = this.getParameter("sysparm_recordid");
        var filename = this.getParameter("sysparm_filename");
        var attachmentid = this.getParameter("sysparm_attachmentid");
        var driveFileId = this.getParameter("sysparm_driveFileId");
        return this.downloadFileProcessor(token, table, recordid, filename, attachmentid, driveFileId);

    },
    /**
     * This function generates additional information of original attachment
     * @ fileid = sys_id of original attachment which is being edited
     */

    getFileDetails: function(fileid) {
        var getattachmentDetails = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment");
        if (getattachmentDetails.get(fileid)) {
            var fileObject = {};
            fileObject.contentType = getattachmentDetails.getValue("content_type");
            fileObject.fileName = encodeURIComponent(getattachmentDetails.getValue("file_name"));
            fileObject.tablename = getattachmentDetails.getValue("table_name");
            fileObject.iconpath = this.getIconPath(getattachmentDetails.getValue("file_name"));
            fileObject.createdBy = getattachmentDetails.getValue("sys_created_by");
            fileObject.createdOn = getattachmentDetails.getValue("sys_created_on");
            fileObject.recordid = getattachmentDetails.getValue("table_sys_id");
            return fileObject;
        }
    },
    /**
     * This method controls the edit link next to the attachment.
     * By default, if a user can edit the respective record can see edit link
     */
    securityRules: function(glideRecord) {
        if (glideRecord.canWrite())
            return true;
        else
            return false;

    },
    /**
     * This method generates the icon path from sys_attachment_icon_rule based on file extension.
     */
    getIconPath: function(filename) {
        filename = "." + filename.split('.').pop();
        var getIcon = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment_icon_rule");
        if (getIcon.get("file_format_indicator", filename)) {
            return getIcon.getValue("icon");
        }
    },
    /**
     * this function deletes the file on onedrive once edit is done.
     */
    deleteDriveFile: function(fileid) {

    },

    /**
     * this function deletes the original attachment which is being edited.
     */
    deletePreviousVersion: function(fileid) {
        var deleteFile = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment");
        if (deleteFile.get(fileid))
            deleteFile.deleteRecord();
    },

    /**
     * This function fetches all the property related to document editor category
     */
    propertyPageCreator: function() {
        var propsDetails = {};
        propsDetails.propsValues = [];
        var category = gs.getProperty("msOffice.property.page.builder.category");
        propsDetails.categoryTitle = this.getDataFromParams("sys_properties_category", "sys_id=" + category, "title");
        var getProps = new GlideRecord("sys_properties_category_m2m");
        getProps.addEncodedQuery("category="+category.toString());
        getProps.query();
        while (getProps.next()) {
            var propsObject = {};
            propsObject.id = getProps.getValue('property');
            propsObject.type = getProps.property.type.toString();
            propsObject.value = getProps.property.value.toString();
            propsObject.description = getProps.property.description.toString();
            propsObject.name = getProps.property.name.toString();
            propsDetails.propsValues.push(propsObject);
        }

        return propsDetails;

    },
    /**
     * This function updates the property related to document editor category
     */
    propertyPageUpdater: function(propertyPayload) {
		this._logger(JSON.stringify(propertyPayload));
        var obj = Object.keys(propertyPayload);
        for (var i = 0; i < obj.length; i++) {
			var objkey = obj[i];
			this._logger("objkey "+objkey);
            var updateProperty = new GlideRecord("sys_properties");
            if (updateProperty.get(objkey.toString())) {                
                updateProperty.value = propertyPayload[objkey];
                updateProperty.update();

            }
        }

    },
    /**
     * This is a resuable function to fetch additional information from a table 
     * @ table = Name of the table e.g. incident
     * @ query = encoded query e.g. "active=true"
     * @ field = desired field to be fetched e.g. number
     */
    getDataFromParams: function(table, query, field) {
        var getData = new GlideRecord(table);
        getData.addEncodedQuery(query);
        getData.query();
        if (getData.next()) {
            return getData.getValue(field);
        }

    },
    /**
     * This is a logger method with on/off switch based on property msOffice.logger.enabled
     */
    _logger: function(message, source) {
        source = source || "MSOfficeUtils";
        if (gs.getProperty("msOffice.logger.enabled") === "true") {
            gs.log(message, source);
        }

    },

    type: 'MSOfficeUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-18 08:43:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>d384d1b607010110850af61d7c1ed0cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>83</sys_mod_count><sys_name>MSOfficeUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d384d1b607010110850af61d7c1ed0cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-23 11:43:41</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
